Text: Cc Good Morning Please is there anything we can do maybe get together our own finances to help Enron What if there was a way we The Enron Family could gather the funds needed to stay ENRON Were pretty much will to do whatever it takes Enron is our company and were here Noone asked the employees if they were willing to help out We can all attempt to get loans and give the money to Enron If youd ask youd be suprised as to the respone youd get We love the company and are willing to do what it takes Enron is Enron I hope this prosposal gets address in some way Were here to help and serve you Mr Lay God Bless Mr Lay The Enron Family and America
